seo.description_social: As a passionate front-end developer, I create modern, high-performance websites using React, Next.js and WordPress.
seo.description: Are you looking for a passionate front-end developer in Belgium? As a specialist in JavaScript, React, Next.js and WordPress, I can transform your ideas into modern, fast and intuitive web interfaces. Whether it's for a showcase site, a web application or a custom solution, I'm here to turn your projects into reality with expertise and creativity.

about.title: Hey !
about.description:
ðŸ‘‹ You've seen my projects, now find out who I am

I'm Dimitri! I'm 36 and I've been living in Brussels for 4 years, after growing up and studying in Paris. For the past 10 years, I've been dedicated to creating unique digital experiences, working with both large agencies and smaller structures.

Over the course of my career, I've had the opportunity to collaborate on a variety of projects, both as part of a team and on my own. This diversity has enabled me to develop a great ability to adapt, both in terms of the working environments and the methodologies used.

Today, I'd like to push back my limits and enrich my range of skills with technologies such as WebGL, 3D, and video games.
